p: No specific documents are available for the management of AR during the COVID-19 pandemic; therefore, stepwise treatment should be performed according to symptom severity. However, given the benefits of controlling AR in patients who also have asthma, AR should also be treated more actively. 34 In cases of mild/intermittent AR or seasonal rhinitis, face-to-face consultation should be postponed, and instead non-face-to-face consultation (online consultation) is advisable.
